QUYN LI KHI MUA TI NEWLOOK

  • Cam kt bn hng chnh hng n b gp 10 nu pht hin hng Fake hoc Replica

Cc cu hi thng gp v sn phm:

- Ch bo hnh cng cch thc vn chuyn sn phm ny th no?

- Kch thc sn phm ny ?

- Sn phm ny c d dng khng ?

Cu hi thng gp

Lm th no ti t hng online?
The swan rt vui lng h tr khch hng t hng online bng mt trong nhng cch t hng sau: - Truy cp trang web: The swan - Gi email t hng v a ch: hi@theswan.com - Lin h s hotline: 1900.636.000 t sn phm - Chat vi t vn vin trn fanpage ca The swan
Nu ti t hng trc tuyn c nhng ri ro g khng?
Vi The swan, khch hng khng phi lo lng, v chng ti cam kt cung cp sn phm cht lng tt, gi c phi chng. c bit, khch hng s nhn c sn phm v thanh ton cng mt thi im.
Nu ti mua sn phm vi s lng nhiu th gi c c gim khng?
Khi mua hng vi s lng nhiu khch hng s c hng ch u i, gim gi ngay ti thi im mua hng. Khch hng vui lng lin h Mode c h tr trc tip qua s in thoi: 1900.636.000
Quy inh hon tr v i sn phm ca Mode nh th no?
Khch hng vui lng tham kho chnh sch i tr sn phm ca The swan c cung cp thng tin y v chi tit nht. Lu : i vi dng sn phm ti v giy iu kin i tr c thc hin trong vng 30 ngy k t ngy nhn hng v hng ho m bo cn gi nguyn tem nhn sn phm. (cha qua s dng)
Ti mua hng ri, khng va c th i li hay khng?{" "}
Khi mua hng nu khch hng khng va vi sn phm, hy cho The swan c bit, chng ti s i ngay sn phm cho khch hng. Ch cn m bo sn phm cha qua s dng, cn nguyn tem nhn. Chng ti s h tr i (size, mu, sn phm khc) cho khch hng.
Ti chn hnh thc thanh ton COD, nhng khi hng ti ni, ti khng mun ly c c khng?
The swan sn sng nhn li hng v mong nhn c phn hi t qu khch.
Ti phi tr ph vn chuyn tn ni nh th no?
Khch hng s c min ph 100% cc vn chuyn trong nc vi n hng tr gi trn 300.000vnd.
Ti c c i sn phm mi hoc hon tr tin khng?
Khi hng ho tho iu kin i/ tr, khch s c i tr v hon tin trong trng hp tr hng hoc i hng c gi tr thp hn
Nu i tr ti khng mang theo ho n v phiu thng tin sn phm th c c i tr khng?{" "}
Trng hp, khch hng khng c ha n hoc phiu thng tin sn phm, Mode vn linh ng i hoc tr sn phm thng qua S in thoi m Khch hng cung cp lc mua hng. Khch hng vui lng cung cp S in thoi cho nhn vin bn hng i sot li vi h thng c h tr nhanh chng.{" "}
Khi t hng online, ti phi thanh ton nh th no?
{" "} Mode cung cp n Khch hng cc hnh thc thanh ton linh hot nh - COD: Thanh ton trc tip khi nhn hng cho nhn vin bu in - Chuyn khon Cc hnh thc v in t khc
